Description:
Research commissioned from IDC indicates that Microsoft partners can earn a significant return helping customers modernize their data platform for the era of AI. Come learn how you can make the most of this economic opportunity and how Microsoft will support you on the journey.

To learn more, please check out these resources: \* https://aka.ms/ignite25-plans-MicrosoftFabricAIDataSolutionsPlan \* https://aka.ms/MSDataPlatformPartnerValue \* https://aka.ms/partnertraining \* https://aka.ms/XIADPartnerOpportunity \* https://aka.ms/AzureAcceleratePartners \* https://aka.ms/DataPlatform-SP-PartnerResources ğ—¦ğ—½ğ—²ğ—®ğ—¸ğ—²ğ—¿ğ˜€: \* Wangui McKelvey \* David Suhrie \* John Turk ğ—¦ğ—²ğ˜€ğ˜€ğ—¶ğ—¼ğ—» ğ—œğ—»ğ—³ğ—¼ğ—¿ğ—ºğ—®ğ˜ğ—¶ğ—¼ğ—»: This is one of many sessions from the Microsoft Ignite 2025 event. Title: How Microsoft's data platform is creating value for partners | PBRK231
